Hand Painted Skateboard Decks

Custom Painted on Request

All of these decks are recycled - they had their day in the sun, and were ridden to near destruction. I enjoy giving new life to something that might otherwise have wound up in a dump somewhere. If you are in Toronto, and have a bunch of old decks lying around, let me know, and I'll take them off your hands - even snapped in half.
